message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but I'm offering you a decent starting point. What do you say?
You got the lion's share in the first round, now it's my turn to take a bigger bite!
Okay, let's be reasonable. I'm willing to give you a bigger share this time, but we need to come to an agreement soon. The value of the money is decreasing with every round.
You're still holding back, Alice. I'll give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
